thisispure.html

Size Matters.

With so many design systems — each including its own variations of type ramps, colors, tokens, etc — a smaller, more simple design system often has advantages over an extensive one for a few reasons:

Keep it simple

Clarity

A minimal design system focuses on the most essential components and guidelines, making it easier for designers and developers to understand and use. There's less cognitive load when the system isn’t cluttered with unnecessary elements.

Efficiency

Teams can work more quickly because they aren't bogged down by excessive options. Decision-making is faster when there are fewer choices to consider.

Color

Colors

Atmos

A minimal design system focuses on the most essential components and guidelines, making it easier for designers and developers to understand and use. There's less cognitive load when the system isn’t cluttered with unnecessary elements.

Grey

// GLOBAL COLORS
$white: #ffffff;
$grey1: #fafafa;
$grey2: #f6f6f6;
$grey3: #f0f0f0;
$grey4: #ebebeb;
$grey5: #e0e0e0;
$grey6: #d2d2d2;
$grey7: #bdbdbd;
$grey8: #9c9c9c;
$grey9: #707070;
$grey10: #616161;
$grey11: #424242;
$grey12: #333333;
$grey13: #242424;
$grey14: #1f1f1f;
$black: #000000;

// ATMOS
$atmos7: #253294;
$atmos6: #3243C5;
$atmos5: #3E54F7;
$atmos4: #6576F9;
$atmos3: #8B98FA;
$atmos2: #B2BBFC;
$atmos1: #D8DDFD;

[data-theme="light"] {
    // DEFAULT
    --bg-primary: #{$white};
    --bg-primary-hover: #{$grey4};
    --bg-primary-pressed: #{$grey5};
    --bg-secondary: #{$grey3};
    --bg-secondary-hover: #{$grey4};
    --bg-secondary-pressed: #{$grey5};
    --text-primary: #{$grey14};
    --text-secondary: #{$grey10};
    --input-stroke: #{$grey8};
    --input-stroke-hover: #{$grey10};
    --input-stroke-pressed: #{$grey12};
    // INVERSE
    --bg-primary-inverse: #{$grey13};
    --bg-primary-hover-inverse: #{$grey14};
    --bg-primary-pressed-inverse: #{$black};
    --bg-secondary-inverse: #{$grey12};
    --bg-secondary-hover-inverse: #{$grey13};
    --bg-secondary-pressed-inverse: #{$grey14};
    --text-primary-inverse: #{$grey1};
    --text-secondary-inverse: #{$grey8};
    --input-stroke-inverse: #{$grey10};
    --input-stroke-hover-inverse: #{$grey8};
    --input-stroke-pressed-inverse: #{$grey6};
    // ALPHA
    --alpha: 90%;
}

[data-theme="dark"] {
    // DEFAULT
    --bg-primary: #{$grey13};
    --bg-primary-hover: #{$grey14};
    --bg-primary-pressed: #{$black};
    --bg-secondary: #{$grey12};
    --bg-secondary-hover: #{$grey13};
    --bg-secondary-pressed: #{$grey14};
    --text-primary: #{$grey1};
    --text-secondary: #{$grey8};
    --input-stroke: #{$grey10};
    --input-stroke-hover: #{$grey8};
    --input-stroke-pressed: #{$grey6};
    // INVERSE
    --bg-primary-inverse: #{$white};
    --bg-primary-hover-inverse: #{$grey4};
    --bg-primary-pressed-inverse: #{$grey5};
    --bg-secondary-inverse: #{$grey3};
    --bg-secondary-hover-inverse: #{$grey4};
    --bg-secondary-pressed-inverse: #{$grey5};
    --text-primary-inverse: #{$grey14};
    --text-secondary-inverse: #{$grey10};
    --input-stroke-inverse: #{$grey8};
    --input-stroke-hover-inverse: #{$grey10};
    --input-stroke-pressed-inverse: #{$grey12};
    // ALPHA
    --alpha: 90%;
}
